pullrequest.title: Fixes for compiling and running tests on Windows 7/Visual Studio 2013

content.raw:
I've modified the CI job for ign-math and now is able to test the external repositories and enable tests even if the configure script disabled them.

For this pull request, the only tests failing are those depending on fixing check_test_ran.py.

http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_math-any-devel-windows7-amd64/18/
